Plot: An adventurous girl finds another world that is a strangely idealized version of her frustrating home, but it has sinister secrets.
Title: Coraline
Actors: Dakota Fanning, Teri Hatcher, Jennifer Saunders, Dawn French
tomatoConsensus: With its vivid stop-motion animation combined with Neil Gaiman's imaginative story, Coraline is a film that's both visually stunning and wondrously entertaining.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 40 nominations.
